## Functions

### deepClone

â–¸ **deepClone**<`T`\>(`source`): `T`

Deeply clones the supplied source

```typescript
  const source = { a: 1, b: { a: 2 } }
  const cloneA = deepClone(source)
  console.log(cloneA !== source) // Outputs false
```
